name: Madness Of Tim
description:
Madness Of Tim is a project made within a 48 time limit for the AIE 2022 December GameJam Made by me, Matthew Scott Watkins a 1st-year game design student. I wanted to use this as opportunity to play around with new things I'd yet to try in Unity. This unfortunately led to the project being a slightly cluttered mess but I had fun even though I didn't have the luxury of incorporating proper sounds or lighting into the final product.  Good luck to everyone else participating, looking forward to seeing all the other submissions :)

Majority of textures sourced through free asset website Poliigon.com.
